params.name: num_embeddings
params.description: The size of embedding dictionary which dictates the maximum value of the input id.

params.name: embedding_dim
params.description: The dimensions of each embedding vector.

params.name: rank
params.description: The rank of the current part, which determines the start index of the vocab.

params.name: weight_attr
params.description: Specify the weight parameter property, including the initialization method.Defaults to None which means the default weight parameter property will be used.

params.name: name
params.description: Normally there is no need for user to set this property.Defaults to None.
